sentences.sContent: You don't need a humanistic education in order to become a herdsman.
sentences.sContent_eng: You don't need a humanistic education in order to become a herdsman.
sentences.sCn: 要成为一个牧人，你不需要接受人文主义的教育。

sentences.sContent: It became a bestseller in Iraq, and was even adapted into a musical, despite one alarming and improbable scene in which a female bear "copulates" with a herdsman.
sentences.sContent_eng: It became a bestseller in Iraq, and was even adapted into a musical, despite one alarming and improbable scene in which a female bear "copulates" with a herdsman.
sentences.sCn: 它在伊拉克成了畅销书，甚至被改编成了音乐剧，尽管其中有一幕令人惊恐且匪夷所思——其中有一个牧人和一头母熊的人兽交。

sentences.sContent: A herd of horses is what the herdsman wants to have.
sentences.sContent_eng: A herd of horses is what the herdsman wants to have.
sentences.sCn: 这个牧人想拥有的是一群马。

trans.tranOther: a man who looks after a herd of animals
